lab4

Class MortgageController

  • java.lang.Object
    • lab4.MortgageController

  • public class MortgageController
extends java.lang.Object

    Mortgage Controller

    This class acts as the controller between the model and the two views. It determines what the view shows and what data is transferred from the model to the two views.
    Since:
    2016-03-26

    • Constructor Detail

      • MortgageController

        public MortgageController(MortgageCalculatorView calcView,
                  MortgageModel theModel,
                  MortgageScheduleView scheduleView)

        Constructor

        takes the two views and the model as parameters and sets them as variables it also then creates the necessary listeners and adds them to the appropriate components in each of the two views
        Parameters:
        calcView -
        theModel -
        scheduleView -

    • Method Detail

      • showMortgageSchedule

        public void showMortgageSchedule()

        Show Initial Mortgage Schedule

        This method shows the first mortgage schedule view. The default is a yearly view but if there is not enough information, then that is changed to a monthly view

      • hideMortgageSchedule

        public void hideMortgageSchedule()

        Hide Mortgage Schedule View

        Set mortgage schedule view visibility to false

      • changeScheduleMonth

        public void changeScheduleMonth()

        Change Schedule View to Monthly

        Get the latest monthly schedule data from the model and update the table in schedule view to display this information. Also toggles the buttons and table header to reflect the change.

      • changeScheduleYear

        public void changeScheduleYear()

        Change Schedule View to Yearly

        Get the latest yearly schedule data from the model and update the table in schedule view to display this information. Also toggles the buttons and table header to reflect the change.

      • setButtonFocus

        public void setButtonFocus()

        Set Window Focus on Calculate Button

        When the calculator view is in focus, the default focus is set on the calculate button in order to allow all the text field helper text to be viewable

      • calculateMortgage

        public void calculateMortgage()

        Calculate Mortgage Payment

        This method is triggered when the calculate button is clicked and takes the values from the text fields and sends the data to the model to be calculated It then sends the received data back to the view to update the result labels

      • resetCalculator

        public void resetCalculator()
